description:
## Release (2025-11-05)

* ember-scoped-css 2.0.0 (major)
* stylelint-ember-scoped-css 1.0.1 (patch)
* v2-addon-ts-glint-2 1.0.0 (major)

#### :boom: Breaking Change
* `ember-scoped-css`, `v2-addon-ts-glint-2`
  * [#360](https://github.com/auditboard/ember-scoped-css/pull/360) Unify Public Build API ([@gossi](https://github.com/gossi))
* `ember-scoped-css`
  * [#362](https://github.com/auditboard/ember-scoped-css/pull/362) No default `@layer` name ([@gossi](https://github.com/gossi))

#### :bug: Bug Fix
* `ember-scoped-css`
  * [#359](https://github.com/auditboard/ember-scoped-css/pull/359) Fix reload problem with separate CSS files ([@gossi](https://github.com/gossi))

#### :memo: Documentation
* Other
  * [#357](https://github.com/auditboard/ember-scoped-css/pull/357) Address issue about import.meta.glob mentioned in #356 ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))
* `v2-addon-ts-glint-2`
  * [#347](https://github.com/auditboard/ember-scoped-css/pull/347) Demo `<style scoped>` in Glint 2 ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))

#### :house: Internal
* `ember-scoped-css`, `stylelint-ember-scoped-css`, `v2-addon-ts-glint-2`
  * [#364](https://github.com/auditboard/ember-scoped-css/pull/364) Update build deps ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))
* Other
  * [#363](https://github.com/auditboard/ember-scoped-css/pull/363) Fix vite pods test ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))
* `ember-scoped-css`
  * [#358](https://github.com/auditboard/ember-scoped-css/pull/358) Switch from `esbuild` to `tsdown` for watch mode ([@gossi](https://github.com/gossi))

#### Committers: 2
- Thomas Gossmann ([@gossi](https://github.com/gossi))
- [@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli)
